home_description: Uhlelo lokuhlola izimpophoma ezincane (miniSASS) liyithuluzi elilula nelifinyeleleka kalula lezokucwaninga olusetshenziswa abantu ukulandelela izinga lekhwalithi namandla amanzi emifuleni nasezimpophomeni. Uqoqe amasampula ezilwanyana ezincane eziphila emanzini (ezincane kodwa ezinkulu ngokwanele ukubonwa ngamehlo ngaphandle kwezinsalela zangaphakathi) endaweni ethile yomfula noma impophoma. Umphakathi wezinambuzane zasemanzini okhona uthumela ulwazi mayelana nekhwalithi namandla amanzi ngokusekelwe emcabangweni wokuthi izinhlobo ezahlukene zalezi zinambuzane zinokubekezelela okwehlukile kanye nokuzwela okuhlukile ekuphazamisekeni nasekungcoleni.
